name: DGW
body:
Dynamic Genome Warping (DGW)
===============

This is the homepage for the open source DGW library developped by Saulius Lukauskas.

Stable binaries of DGW are distributed over PyPi and you should be able to install it using `setuptools`:
``` 
easy_install dgw
```

If this fails, consult the [Installation section in the documentation](https://dgw.readthedocs.org/en/latest/#installation) for a quick guide on how to install it.

Specifically, have a read through the [Quick Start Guide](https://dgw.readthedocs.org/en/latest/#quickstart) for a guide on how to get started with DGW,
or consult the full documentation at https://dgw.readthedocs.org.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
